title: Birthday Boy Bash
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and strict visual reference. Recreate the exact same vertical birthday poster composition with ultra-high accuracy and fidelity. The design features a soft, cinematic collage layout with multiple portraits of the same adult Indian man arranged in a grid-like background. The background images show him in different outfits and moods: holding a professional DSLR camera while smiling, standing casually in a white shirt outdoors, wearing a formal blazer, and relaxed candid poses. All background portraits must appear softly faded, partially desaturated, and blended together with smooth transitions, subtle blur, and pastel overlays in warm peach, beige, and light cream tones, creating a dreamy and nostalgic atmosphere.

The main subject is positioned prominently in the center foreground, shown from chest-up in side profile facing right. He has a well-groomed beard and mustache, medium-length hair tied back in a neat man bun, and is wearing round sunglasses with thin metal frames. His expression is calm, confident, and reflective. The main subject is rendered in sharper focus than the background, with higher contrast and clarity, while still maintaining a soft cinematic look. Clothing is a light-colored casual shirt with visible fabric texture.

Lighting is soft, diffused, and natural, with no harsh shadows. A gentle white glow and fog-like light bloom rises from the bottom of the image, partially fading the lower torso and blending smoothly into the background. Overall color grading is warm, muted, and elegant, with pastel highlights and low saturation.

At the bottom center, include elegant serif typography reading "happy BIRTHDAY to you". The word "BIRTHDAY" is large, uppercase, and bold in a classic serif font, colored deep teal or dark bluish-green. The words "happy" and "to you" are smaller, minimal, and placed above and to the right of the main word respectively, maintaining a clean editorial layout.

The entire poster should feel premium, emotional, and celebratory, suitable for a classy birthday tribute. Maintain the same framing, spacing, proportions, subject placement, background collage structure, glow intensity, and typography hierarchy exactly as the reference image. Ultra-detailed, photorealistic, professional poster design, smooth blending, perfect masking, high resolution, and clean edges.

title: Birthday Girl Aesthetic
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the strict visual reference and recreate the same vertical birthday poster with ultra-high accuracy and fidelity. The design has a minimal, modern scrapbook aesthetic with a textured paper background. The background consists of layered torn-paper textures in soft beige and muted pastel green tones, giving a handmade, organic feel.

Large hand-painted brush-style typography dominates the upper center reading "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" in bold uppercase letters. The font appears rough, organic, and paint-textured, colored in muted sage green. The text looks slightly imperfect and natural, as if painted with a dry brush.

Above the main text, include a small subtle sentence in a clean minimal font: "Happy birthday to a dude who isn't showing his age or acting it, either." This line is understated, centered, and blends softly with the background.

Below the main title, include a small handwritten-style script text reading "To you, our" placed casually, matching the scrapbook theme.

The main subject is a young Indian woman placed in the lower right area of the poster, shown from waist-up. She wears a black blouse with sheer lace sleeves and a light cream or off-white skirt. Her hair is long, black, and naturally wavy, worn loose. She wears traditional earrings and has a gentle, confident smile. Skin tones are natural and warm. Lighting is soft, even, and flattering with no harsh shadows.

The subject is cleanly cut out and surrounded by a soft peach or light coral glow/outline, separating her clearly from the background while maintaining a warm aesthetic.

Overall color grading is soft, muted, earthy, and elegant. Maintain exact framing, subject placement, text layout, font style, proportions, color palette, and visual hierarchy as the reference image. The final result should feel premium, calm, modern, and celebratory with a handcrafted poster look. Ultra-detailed, high-resolution, professional birthday poster design with smooth textures and clean masking.

title: Birthday Boy with Red Hat
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the ONLY facial identity reference. DO NOT change the person.

Preserve the exact same face with 1:1 accuracy — identical facial proportions, jawline, cheekbones, chin shape, nose width and length, nostril shape, lip thickness, smile shape, teeth alignment, eye size, eye spacing, eyelid fold, eyebrow thickness and angle, forehead height, hairline, skin tone, skin texture, pores, micro-details, and all natural imperfections.

Subject: A young man standing confidently with a relaxed smile, medium-brown skin tone, ultra-realistic natural skin texture, visible pores, soft natural highlights, no artificial smoothing, no beautification.

Hair: EXACT same hairstyle as reference — short to medium length, natural texture, slightly messy, dark hair tone, unchanged hairline and volume.

Cap: Red baseball cap worn forward, same size, same position, same angle, same fabric texture and stitching.

Expression: EXACT same smile, same mouth openness, same teeth visibility, same eye direction (looking slightly sideways), same calm and confident emotion.

Pose & Framing: Standing casually with hands resting near the waist/hips, same body posture, same shoulder angle, same body proportions, half-body to near full-body framing exactly matching the reference perspective.

Clothing: Light purple / lavender casual shirt with vertical texture lines, two chest pockets, visible buttons, realistic fabric folds and creases; dark pants with the same fit, length, and drape as the reference. Clothing color, cut, and texture must remain unchanged.

Cut-out Style: Clean white sticker-style outline around the subject, smooth crisp edges, no distortion, no jagged lines, perfectly separated silhouette.

Background: Soft pastel blue background with large white typography reading "happy birthday" in oversized modern sans-serif font, partially cropped by the frame for a contemporary design look.

Design Elements: Polaroid-style photo frames placed diagonally in the background, showing the SAME person in black-and-white versions, shallow depth of field, scrapbook collage aesthetic, balanced composition.

Lighting: Soft diffused daylight lighting, evenly lit face, natural contrast, no harsh shadows, realistic light falloff.

Overall Style: Aesthetic birthday poster, modern collage design, clean layout, professional graphic design quality.

Quality & Realism: Ultra-realistic subject, high resolution, 8K detail, sharp focus, no blur, no artifacts, no AI distortion, no face morphing, no identity drift.

title: Sweet Birthday Girl
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the strict visual reference and recreate the same vertical birthday poster with ultra-high accuracy. The poster has a bright, cheerful, minimal aesthetic. The background is a bold mustard-yellow fabric texture with visible natural wrinkles and soft cloth grain, evenly lit and filling the entire frame.

At the top center, include large playful rounded typography reading "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" in all caps. The font is thick, bubbly, friendly, and slightly irregular, colored solid white, standing out clearly against the yellow background.

The main subject is a young Indian woman placed in the lower center of the frame, shown from chest-up. She is smiling brightly with a joyful, youthful expression. Her pose is playful and cute, with both hands placed under her chin forming a frame around her face. She has short, naturally curly black hair, with a small yellow flower tucked on one side near her ear. Her skin tone is warm and natural.

She is wearing a black short-sleeve top with a delicate pink and white floral print. The subject is cleanly cut out from her original background and placed smoothly over the yellow fabric background, with soft edges and natural blending. Lighting on the subject is bright and even, with no harsh shadows, preserving a fresh outdoor look.

Overall color grading is vibrant, warm, and happy, emphasizing a celebratory mood. Maintain exact framing, subject placement, pose, hand positioning, facial expression, background texture, text size, font style, alignment, and color palette exactly as the reference image. Ultra-detailed, high-resolution, professional birthday poster design with clean masking, crisp edges, and a fun, energetic aesthetic.

title: Bright Birthday Girl
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the strict visual reference and recreate the same vertical birthday poster with ultra-high accuracy. The poster features a clean, bold, modern design with a solid deep blue background filling the entire frame, smooth and evenly lit with no texture or gradient.

At the top center, include large bold uppercase typography reading "HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!" The font is thick, blocky, sans-serif, and playful, colored bright yellow with strong contrast against the blue background. The exclamation marks are included and match the same font weight and color.

Below the main title, add a smaller white quote in a simple, clean sans-serif font: "Age is just a number. Unfortunately for you, that number is getting bigger today. Happy birthday, anyway!" The quote is centered, subtle, and readable, maintaining a light humorous tone.

The main subject is a young Indian woman placed in the lower center of the frame, shown from waist-up, seated casually. She is wearing a blue-and-white horizontal striped top with three-quarter sleeves and grey jeans. A wristwatch is visible on her left wrist. She has long black hair swept over one shoulder, sunglasses resting on top of her head, small earrings, and a calm, friendly smile. Her posture is relaxed, with hands gently clasped on her lap.

The subject is cleanly cut out from the original background and placed against the blue backdrop, with a subtle soft outline or glow to separate her from the background while keeping a natural look. Lighting on the subject is even and natural, preserving realistic skin tones and soft facial features.

Overall style is bold, simple, cheerful, and contemporary. Maintain exact framing, subject placement, pose, clothing details, text content, font style, text alignment, color palette, and visual hierarchy exactly as the reference image. Ultra-detailed, high-resolution, professional birthday poster design with clean masking and crisp edges.

title: Royal Black & Gold Birthday Poster
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and absolute facial reference.
Preserve the subject’s face exactly as it is — same facial structure, skin texture, skin tone, eye shape, nose, lips, jawline, beard or clean shave, expression accuracy, age, and identity. No beautification, no reshaping, no face swap, no AI alteration of facial features. The face must remain 100% identical to the uploaded image.

Create a royal black-and-gold themed birthday poster shot in a professional studio environment.

Subject: Adult man seated confidently on a modern luxury chair (matte black, leather, or minimal metallic design).

Pose: Strong, confident seated posture, back straight, shoulders relaxed but powerful, one arm resting naturally on the chair arm, the other relaxed or placed on the thigh. Head slightly turned sideways (not facing the camera straight), eyes calm and composed, expression confident and premium.

Outfit: Dark classy formal outfit — black or deep charcoal suit, blazer, or tailored jacket with subtle gold accents (gold buttons, gold embroidery line, gold cuff detail, gold chain, or luxury watch). Outfit must look elegant, masculine, and high-end.

Lighting: Cinematic studio lighting — soft key light highlighting the face, gentle rim light creating a gold edge glow around the shoulders and head, deep shadows for contrast, dramatic but clean lighting, luxury fashion photography style. No harsh overexposure.

Background: Matte black background with abstract gold elements — soft gold light streaks, elegant gold particles, minimal geometric gold shapes, or subtle gold smoke texture. Background must feel royal, premium, and uncluttered.

Typography & Text Rules (STRICT):
– Display ONLY the text “HAPPY BIRTHDAY”
– Text must be bold metallic gold, uppercase, luxury serif or premium display font
– DO NOT include any name, initials, extra words, dates, or symbols
– Text positioned tastefully in the composition, not overlapping the face

Color Grading: Deep blacks, rich gold highlights, cinematic contrast, luxury tone.

Style: Premium, royal, bold, masculine, luxury birthday poster design.

Camera & Quality: Studio portrait photography, sharp focus, ultra-realistic skin texture, high dynamic range, professional poster composition, magazine-cover quality, 8K detail, no blur.

Final Look: A high-end royal birthday poster that looks like a luxury fashion editorial while keeping the subject’s face completely unchanged.

title: Cinematic Walking Birthday Poster
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and strongest visual reference.

Recreate the image with near-pixel-perfect accuracy, preserving the exact composition, framing, proportions, perspective, depth, lighting, shadows, and color tones.

SUBJECT:
A stylish adult man walking forward confidently, full body visible, slight head tilt downward, relaxed masculine posture. One hand inside pant pocket, the other relaxed naturally. Natural walking pose with realistic motion blur on the foot sole. Face partially serious, calm, confident expression.

FACE & HAIR:
Preserve the user’s original facial structure, skin texture, beard density, mustache shape, jawline, and hairline exactly as uploaded. Hair styled naturally with slight volume, clean edges, no distortion, no beautification, no face change.

ACCESSORIES:
– Black or dark sunglasses with realistic reflection
– Wired earphones or headphones connected, cable clearly visible
– ID card hanging on a red lanyard around the neck
– Small personal items subtly visible inside the pant pocket (earphone wire, card edge, or fabric fold realism)

CLOTHING:
– Casual checkered shirt (red / dark maroon / muted tones), sleeves rolled naturally
– Black formal or semi-formal pants
– Brown leather shoes with visible sole texture
– Shirt fabric folds, wrinkles, and stitching must look photorealistic
– Clothing fit must match the original image exactly

BACKGROUND & ENVIRONMENT:
– Deep maroon / wine-red monochrome studio background
– Vertical layered panel design behind the subject
– A large, soft-opacity portrait of the same man in the background, slightly blurred, wearing sunglasses, facing sideways
– Smooth gradient lighting from top to bottom
– Clean, cinematic poster look
– No additional objects, no scenery change

TEXT & TYPOGRAPHY (IMPORTANT):
– On the RIGHT side: Vertical text reading exactly:
  "HAPPY BIRTHDAY"
  (same font style, spacing, alignment, size, and vertical orientation as the reference image)

– On the LEFT side:
  Replace any existing name text with:
  "Rowdy boy"
  Use a bold, stylish handwritten or cinematic font, white color, positioned in the same area as the original name text.

– Do NOT add any other names or words.
– Do NOT change font weight, glow, or placement other than the text content itself.

LIGHTING & COLOR:
– Soft cinematic lighting
– Balanced contrast
– No harsh highlights
– Natural skin tones
– Background and subject color harmony preserved
– No color grading changes

QUALITY & STYLE:
– Ultra-realistic
– High resolution
– Poster-quality finish
– Sharp focus on subject, soft depth in background
– No AI artifacts
– No extra elements
– No pose change
– No camera angle change

STRICT RULES:
Everything must remain the same as the reference image:
composition, background, pose, clothing style, lighting, typography placement, and mood.

ONLY replace the left-side name text with "Rowdy boy".

title: Bold Outline Cinematic Birthday Poster
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and strict visual reference. Preserve the exact composition, framing, subject pose, body proportions, facial structure, hairstyle, clothing fit, textures, and lighting. Do not change the model’s identity, gender, age, or expression.

SUBJECT DETAILS:
A young man standing in a three-quarter side profile, looking to the right. He wears a black mesh trucker cap with a curved brim, slightly worn. Hair is curly and peeking out naturally from under the cap. Skin tone, facial hair stubble, jawline, and nose shape must remain exactly the same.

CLOTHING (DO NOT ALTER):
Brown oversized T-shirt with a large off-white star graphic at the center chest, containing a black star silhouette inside it. Fabric texture is soft cotton with visible folds and wrinkles. Blue relaxed-fit jeans with natural creases. Clothing color, graphic placement, scale, and texture must match pixel-for-pixel.

OUTLINE EFFECT:
Subject is surrounded by a bold, thick red cutout outline glow. The outline must follow the body silhouette precisely with smooth edges, consistent thickness, and slightly soft edges. No color change, no glow variation.

BACKGROUND:
Industrial warehouse environment filled with stacked black rubber tires. Tires are arranged in depth layers, slightly blurred to create depth-of-field. Lighting is cinematic, moody, and low-key. Color palette is dark, earthy, and neutral.

TEXT & TYPOGRAPHY:
Large bold white uppercase text reading "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" behind the subject. Font must be extremely bold, sans-serif, block-style, tightly kerned, and identical in weight and spacing. Text is partially obscured by the subject’s body. Text placement, scale, and alignment must remain exactly the same.

IMPORTANT:
Do NOT add any extra names, logos, watermarks, or text (including "OXY"). Keep only the original visible text style and placement.

IMAGE STYLE:
High-contrast cinematic photography, sharp subject focus, soft background blur, professional poster-grade color grading, dramatic lighting, clean shadows, no over-smoothing.

CAMERA & QUALITY:
DSLR-style image, shallow depth of field, 50mm lens look, ultra-high resolution, crisp edges, realistic textures, natural skin tones.

STRICT RULES:
No pose change, no outfit change, no font change, no background change, no color shift, no added elements, no removed elements. Output must look nearly identical to the input image.

title: Vintage Stamp Style Birthday Poster
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and absolute facial reference.
Preserve the subject’s face exactly as it is — identical facial structure, skin tone, skin texture, eye shape, nose, lips, jawline, hairline, expression accuracy, age, and identity. No beautification, no reshaping, no face swap, no AI alteration of facial features. The face must remain 100% identical to the uploaded image.

Create a vintage stamp-style poster composition with a bold, graphic layout.

Main Subject:
A young woman positioned slightly off-center, facing sideways with a calm, serious, thoughtful expression. Natural posture, shoulders relaxed, head turned slightly to the side, eyes looking off-frame.

Outfit:
Minimal, elegant sleeveless or strapless light-colored outfit (off-white / cream tone). Clean, simple fabric with no heavy patterns, allowing focus on the face and composition.

Hair:
Long, natural hair flowing down one side, realistic texture, soft highlights, no artificial styling.

Foreground Elements:
Bright, realistic sunflowers placed partially in front of and beside the subject, overlapping the frame naturally. Rich yellow petals, dark brown centers, high botanical realism.

Frame Design:
A white postage-stamp style border around the portrait — perforated edges, clean, symmetrical, centered perfectly within the poster.

Background (Inside Frame):
Soft warm beige or cream background, smooth texture, subtle vintage film grain.

Outer Background:
Bold solid red background filling the entire canvas outside the stamp frame, flat color, no gradients.

Typography Rules (STRICT):
– Display ONLY the text “HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU”
– Text must be large, elegant, and visually dominant
– Use a premium serif or classy handwritten-style font suitable for artistic posters
– Text color harmonized with the design (off-white, cream, or subtle gold)
– Text placed tastefully within or slightly overlapping the stamp frame without covering the face
– DO NOT include any name, year, initials, numbers, or extra words

Color Palette:
Strong red, warm beige, bright sunflower yellow, deep green stems, natural skin tones.

Lighting:
Soft, even lighting on the face, no harsh shadows, natural contrast, cinematic grading with a subtle vintage film look.

Style:
Artistic poster, editorial, cinematic, retro-modern, stamp illustration aesthetic, minimal yet bold.

Camera & Quality:
Sharp focus, ultra-realistic facial detail, high-resolution poster quality, clean edges, professional composition.

Final Look:
A bold, artistic vintage stamp-style birthday poster with “HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU” as the only text, combining realism and graphic design while keeping the subject’s face completely unchanged.

title: Traditional Saree Birthday Poster
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as a STRICT reference and recreate it IDENTICAL in every visual aspect. Preserve the exact subject, pose, facial features, expression, hairstyle, skin tone, jewelry, saree drape, blouse design, fabric texture, embroidery, folds, lighting, shadows, background color, floral decorations, and overall composition.

SUBJECT:
A woman posed exactly as in the reference image, facing slightly forward with a calm expression. Keep facial structure, eyes, lips, bindi placement, makeup style, and hair exactly the same.

CLOTHING & ACCESSORIES (DO NOT CHANGE):
Deep maroon saree with detailed gold embroidery and vertical patterns. Matching maroon blouse. Same saree drape position. Same gold earrings design and size. Same hand placement and posture.

FLORAL ELEMENTS:
Decorative roses and leaves at the bottom corner in the same colors, size, placement, and style. Do not add or remove any flowers.

BACKGROUND:
Soft blurred warm peach–rose gradient background. Keep the same tone, lighting falloff, and smooth texture. No background modification.

TEXT (ONLY CHANGE ALLOWED):
Remove ALL existing name text completely, including any credits or small text. Add new text reading "HAPPY BIRTHDAY".
Font must be elegant, decorative serif with soft curves, matching the original name font style and thickness. Text color should be deep maroon or wine red, matching the saree palette. Text position should be at the top, centered, balanced, and clean.

IMPORTANT RULE:
NO other text, names, logos, watermarks, or credits allowed.

LIGHTING & QUALITY:
Soft studio portrait lighting, realistic skin texture, gentle highlights, professional color grading.

FINAL OUTPUT:
The result must look like the same image with ONLY the name text replaced by HAPPY BIRTHDAY.

title: Birthday Poster Recreation
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as a STRICT primary reference. Recreate the image IDENTICALLY with zero visual changes. Preserve exact composition, framing, subject identity, facial features, beard, hairstyle, sunglasses shape and reflection, expression, pose, hand position, rings, bracelet, chain necklace, sleeveless black vest, open checked shirt color and texture, fabric folds, lighting, shadows, and skin tone.

SUBJECT & LAYOUT:
Two layered versions of the same subject. Front subject in full color. Back subject in black and white, slightly offset behind. Maintain exact alignment, scale, and depth.

OUTLINE EFFECT:
Bold smooth white cut-out outline surrounding both subjects. Keep thickness, softness, and edge precision exactly the same.

BACKGROUND:
Clean light neutral background. No gradients added. No texture change.

TEXT (NO CHANGE ALLOWED):
Keep the handwritten "Happy Birthday!" text exactly as it is — same font style, stroke thickness, color, placement, underline stroke, and spacing. Do not add or remove any text.

IMPORTANT RULE:
Absolutely no edits, no enhancements, no removals, no additions. The output must look pixel-identical to the input image.

FINAL RESULT:
The generated image must appear as the same poster with no visible difference.

title: Minimal Aesthetic Birthday Portrait – Orange Theme
prompt: Use the uploaded image as the primary reference. Preserve the exact composition, camera angle, framing, subject pose, facial structure, expression, skin tone, hairstyle, hair length, makeup style, clothing fit, body proportions, and overall realism. The subject is a young woman sitting confidently on large 3D typography blocks. She is wearing an orange short-sleeve hoodie with a front zipper, light blue fitted jeans, and white sneakers with orange laces. Her posture is relaxed, legs apart, hands resting naturally between her knees. Her hair is medium-length, softly wavy, side-parted, and neatly styled. Makeup is natural with soft brows, subtle blush, neutral lips, and clear skin texture. Lighting is soft, diffused studio lighting with gentle shadows, evenly illuminating the face and clothing. Background is a minimal indoor studio with warm beige tones and smooth gradient walls, clean and uncluttered. Remove the existing large numeric text '2026' completely. Replace it with large, clean, matte-finish 3D typography reading 'Happy Birthday'. The new text should match the original size, perspective, depth, and placement of the previous text, positioned behind and beneath the subject, acting as a seat. Typography style should be modern, bold, sans-serif, minimalistic, with a soft neutral gray or off-white color, realistic shadows, and grounded contact with the floor. Maintain realistic depth, accurate occlusion where the subject overlaps the text, and correct shadow casting from the subject onto the typography. Floor should remain smooth, matte, and neutral. Overall look should be photorealistic, high-resolution, editorial-style birthday portrait with a clean, modern aesthetic.

title: Minimal Aesthetic Birthday Portrait – Orange Theme (Male)
prompt: Use the uploaded image as the primary reference. Preserve the exact composition, camera angle, framing, subject pose, body proportions, and overall realism. Outfit remains minimal and modern: an orange short-sleeve hoodie or sweatshirt with a front zipper, light blue fitted jeans, and white sneakers with orange laces, maintaining the same color palette and clothing fit style. Background remains a clean indoor studio with warm beige tones and a smooth gradient wall, uncluttered and minimal. Remove the existing numeric text '2026' entirely. Replace it with large, bold, modern 3D typography reading 'Happy Birthday'. The text should match the original scale, depth, perspective, and placement, positioned behind and beneath the subject, functioning as a seat. Ensure accurate occlusion where the subject overlaps the text, with natural shadow casting from the subject onto the typography and floor. Floor surface remains smooth, matte, and neutral. Overall result should be a high-resolution, photorealistic, editorial-style birthday portrait with a clean, modern aesthetic.
